name: Castlevania: Orchestra of Despair
overview:
Here’s a Castlevania hack that was released February, 5th 2005. Dr. Mario remade the graphics and levels to give Castlevania a different feel. Fans of Castlevania will like this hack, and everyone else should give it a shot. So what are you waiting for? Play it now.

-STORY-
In a small village in Transylvania the Belmont clan lived to protect the world from Dracula's curse. Simon succeeded in his task... but something went wrong. Ten years after he defeated Dracula a group of cultists rose Dracula and his Castle! It's up to Simon to go back and slay the Count!
